summary.span: 提供用于创建、复制、删除、移动和打开文件的属性和实例方法，并且帮助创建 对象。

span.span: Provides properties and instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of objects.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类执行典型操作，例如复制、移动、重命名、创建、打开、删除和追加到文件。Use the class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, opening, deleting, and appending to files. 如果对同一文件执行多个操作，则使用 实例方法而不是 类的相应静态方法会更有效，因为并不总是需要安全检查。If you are performing multiple operations on the same file, it can be more efficient to use instance methods instead of the corresponding static methods of the class, because a security check will not always be necessary. 许多 方法在您创建或打开文件时返回其他 i/o 类型。Many of the methods return other I/O types when you create or open files. 您可以使用这些其他类型进一步操作文件。You can use these other types to further manipulate a file. 有关详细信息，请参阅特定 成员，如 、、、或 。For more information, see specific members such as , , , , or . 默认情况下，将向所有用户授予对新文件的完全读/写访问权限。By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users. 下表描述了用于自定义各种 方法的行为的枚举。The following table describes the enumerations that are used to customize the behavior of various methods. |枚举Enumeration|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||指定对文件的读取和写入访问权限。Specifies read and write access to a file.| ||指定已在使用的文件所允许的访问级别。Specifies the level of access permitted for a file that is already in use.| ||指定是保留还是覆盖现有文件的内容，以及创建现有文件的请求是否会引发异常。Specifies whether the contents of an existing file are preserved or overwritten, and whether requests to create an existing file cause an exception.| > [!NOTE] > 在接受路径作为输入字符串的成员中，该路径必须格式正确，否则会引发异常。In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 例如，如果路径是完全限定的，但以空格开头，则不会在类的方法中剪裁路径。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class. 因此，路径格式不正确，并引发异常。Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised. 同样，路径或路径的组合不能完全限定两次。Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，在大多数情况下，"c：\temp c：\windows" 也会引发异常。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases. 使用接受路径字符串的方法时，请确保路径格式正确。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 在接受路径的成员中，路径可以引用文件或只引用目录。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路径还可以引用服务器和共享名称的相对路径或通用命名约定（UNC）路径。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，以下所有内容都是可接受的路径：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c：\\\MyDir\\" 中C#的 "\MyFile.txt" 或 "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" 中的 Visual Basic。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - Visual Basic 中的 "c：\\C#\MyDir" 或 "c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - Visual Basic 中的 "MyDir\\C#\MySubdir" 或 "MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - \\中的 "\\\\\\\MyServer\\C#\MyShare" 或 "Visual Basic \MyServer\MyShare"。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 类提供了以下属性，使您可以检索有关文件的信息。The class provides the following properties that enable you to retrieve information about a file. 有关如何使用每个属性的示例，请参阅属性页。For an example of how to use each property, see the property pages. - 属性检索一个对象，该对象表示文件的父目录。The property retrieves an object that represents the parent directory of a file. - 属性检索文件的父目录的完整路径。The property retrieves the full path of the parent directory of a file. - 属性检查是否存在文件，然后再对其进行操作。The property checks for the presence of a file before operating on it. - 属性检索或设置一个值，该值指定是否可以修改文件。The property retrieves or sets a value that specifies whether a file can be modified. - 检索文件的大小。The retrieves the size of a file. - 检索文件的名称。The retrieves the name of a file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 `FileInfo` 类的一些主要成员。The following example demonstrates some of the main members of the `FileInfo` class. 第一次检索属性时， 调用 方法并缓存有关文件的信息。When the properties are first retrieved, calls the method and caches information about the file. 在后续调用中，必须调用 以获取最新的信息副本。On subsequent calls, you must call to get the latest copy of the information. [!code-cpp[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/CPP/finfo class.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/CS/finfo class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/VB/finfo class.vb#1)] 此示例生成与下面类似的输出。This example produces output similar to the following. ``` Hello And Welcome C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70AB.tmp was copied to C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70CB.tmp. C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70CB.tmp was successfully deleted. ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Decrypt() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 方法解密由当前帐户加密的文件。

span.span: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 方法，你可以对使用 方法加密的文件进行解密。The method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the method. 方法只能对使用当前用户帐户加密的文件进行解密。The method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account. 方法和 方法使用安装在计算机上的加密服务提供程序（CSP）以及调用方法的进程的文件加密密钥。Both the method and the method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method. 当前文件系统必须设置为 NTFS 格式，并且当前操作系统必须是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更高版本。The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Microsoft Windows NT or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法和 方法对文件进行加密和解密。The following code example uses the method and the method to encrypt and then decrypt a file. [!code-cpp[IO.FileInfo.Encrypt-Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.Encrypt-Decrypt/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.FileInfo.Encrypt-Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.Encrypt-Decrypt/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.FileInfo.Encrypt-Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.Encrypt-Decrypt/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将某个文件加密，使得只有加密该文件的帐户才能将其解密。

span.span: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 方法，您可以对文件进行加密，以便只有用于调用此方法的帐户才能对文件进行解密。The method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it. 使用 方法对 方法加密的文件进行解密。Use the method to decrypt a file encrypted by the method. 方法和 方法使用安装在计算机上的加密服务提供程序（CSP）以及调用方法的进程的文件加密密钥。Both the method and the method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method. 当前文件系统必须设置为 NTFS 格式，并且当前操作系统必须是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更高版本。The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Microsoft Windows NT or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法和 方法对文件进行加密，然后将其解密。The following code example uses the method and the method to encrypt a file and then decrypt it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次调用时， 调用 并缓存有关文件的信息。When first called, calls and caches information about the file. 在后续调用中，必须调用 以获取最新的信息副本。On subsequent calls, you must call to get the latest copy of the information. 如果在尝试确定指定文件是否存在时出现任何错误，则 属性返回 `false`。The property returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists. 这种情况可能发生在引发异常的情况，例如，传递包含无效字符或太多字符的文件名、出现故障或缺失的磁盘，或者如果调用方没有读取文件的权限。This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性在打开文件之前确保文件存在。The following code example uses the property ensure a file exists before opening it. 当找不到文件时，可以使用此方法引发自定义异常。You can use this technique to throw a custom exception when the file is not found. returns.span: 新的或现有文件的只写非共享的 对象。

span.span: A write-only unshared object for a new or existing file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件路径中已存在一个文件，则 方法会打开该文件，如果该文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。The method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist. 对于现有文件，它不会将新文本追加到现有文本。For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text. 相反，它会用新字符覆盖现有字符。Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters. 如果使用较短的字符串（如 "第二次运行"）覆盖较长的字符串（如 "这是 OpenWrite 方法的测试"），则该文件将包含字符串的混合（"OpenWrite 方法的第二个 runtest"）。If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (like "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method"). ## Examples 下面的示例打开一个文件以进行写入，然后从该文件中读取。The following example opens a file for writing and then reads from the file. [!code-cpp[finfo openwrite#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo OpenWrite/CPP/file openwrite.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[finfo openwrite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo OpenWrite/CS/file openwrite.cs#1)] [!code-vb[finfo openwrite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo OpenWrite/VB/file openwrite.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将指定文件的内容替换为当前 对象所描述的文件的内容。The method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of the file described by the current object. 它还创建被替换文件的备份。It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced. 最后，它将返回一个新的 对象，该对象描述覆盖的文件。Finally, it returns a new object that describes the overwritten file. > [!CAUTION] > 如果 `destFileName` 是只读的并且不会引发异常，则此方法在 Windows 2000 环境中将会成功。This method will succeed in Windows 2000 environments if the `destFileName` is read-only and will not raise an exception. 使用 "" 属性来检查目标文件在尝试替换之前是否为只读。Use the property to check if the destination file is read-only before attempting to replace it. 如果不想创建要替换的文件的备份，请将 `null` 传递给 `destBackupFileName` 参数。Pass `null` to the `destBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将文件替换为其他文件，并创建被替换文件的备份。The following example uses the method to replace a file with another file and create a backup of the replaced file. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessControl(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity fileSecurity) cil managed

param.name: fileSecurity
param.span: 一个 对象，该对象描述要应用于当前文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

span.span: A object that describes an access control list (ACL) entry to apply to the current file.

summary.span: 将 对象所描述的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项应用于当前 对象所描述的文件。

span.span: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a object to the file described by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将访问控制列表（ACL）项应用到表示 noninherited ACL 列表的当前文件。The method applies access control list (ACL) entries to the current file that represents the noninherited ACL list. 只要需要在文件中添加或删除 ACL 条目，请使用 方法。Use the method whenever you need to add or remove ACL entries from a file. > [!CAUTION] > 为 `fileSecurity` 参数指定的 ACL 将替换该文件的现有 ACL。The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file. 若要为新用户添加权限，请使用 方法获取现有 ACL，对其进行修改，然后使用 将其应用回文件。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use to apply it back to the file. ACL 描述对给定文件具有或没有特定操作权限的个人和/或组。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 方法仅保留在对象创建后修改的 对象。The method persists only objects that have been modified after object creation. 如果 对象尚未修改，则不会将其保存到文件中。If a object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file. 因此，无法从一个文件中检索 的对象，并将相同的对象重新应用到另一个文件。Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a object from one file and reapply the same object to another file. 若要将 ACL 信息从一个文件复制到另一个文件：To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1. 使用 方法可以从源文件中检索 对象。Use the method to retrieve the object from the source file. 2. 为目标文件创建新的 对象。Create a new object for the destination file. 3. 使用源 对象的 或 方法来检索 ACL 信息。Use the or method of the source object to retrieve the ACL information. 4. 使用 或 方法将在步骤3中检索到的信息复制到目标 对象。Use the or method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination object. 5. 使用 方法将目标 对象设置为目标文件。Set the destination object to the destination file using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法和 方法来添加并删除文件中的 ACL 项。The following code example uses the method and the method to add and then remove an ACL entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法返回的字符串表示传递到 构造函数的路径。The string returned by the method represents the path that was passed to the constructor. 你应根据你的意图检索以下任一属性的值，而不是调用 `ToString` 方法：Instead of calling the `ToString` method, you should retrieve the value of either of the following properties, depending on your intent: > - ，则获取文件的名称，而不包含任何父路径信息。, to get the name of the file, without any parent path information. > - [FullName](xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.FullName)：获取该文件的完全限定路径。[FullName](xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.FullName), to get the fully qualified path of the file.
